Description:
Detects installation of suspicious packages using system installation utilities

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Package Installed - Linux
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((((process_path like '%/apt' or process_path like '%/apt-get') and command like '%install%') or (process_path like '%/yum' and (command like '%localinstall%' or command like '%install%')) or (process_path like '%/rpm' and command like '%-i%') or (process_path like '%/dpkg' and (command like '%--install%' or command like '%-i%'))) and (command like '%nmap%' or command like '% nc%' or command like '%netcat%' or command like '%wireshark%' or command like '%tshark%' or command like '%openconnect%' or command like '%proxychains%'))
